org.xchain.framework.factory

Class TemplatesFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.factory.TemplatesFactory

  • public class TemplatesFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The TemplatesFactory is used to load Templates. These templates are cached but not reloading.
    Author:
    Devon Tackett, Christian Trimble, Mike Moulton, Josh Kennedy

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static final TemplatesFactory getInstance()

      • getTemplates

        public SaxTemplates getTemplates(java.lang.String systemId,
                        SourceStrategy<org.xml.sax.InputSource> sourceStrategy,
                        TemplatesConsumerStrategy consumerStrategy)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieve the Templates for the given systemId. The templates object will be wrapped with a reloading wrapper, if reloading is on.
        Parameters:
        systemId - The id of the Templates to load.
        sourceStrategy - The strategy to create sources to load the Templates from.
        consumerStrategy - The strategy for turning Templates sources into Templates objects.
        Returns:
        The Templates object for the given id.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getTemplates

        public SaxTemplates getTemplates(java.lang.String systemId)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads a templates object from a standard stream source.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
